subject: Need help with my account
body:
Hi Support Team,

I'm having issues accessing my account. Here are my details in case you need them:

Email: john.smith@business.com
Phone: 555-123-4567
SSN: 123-45-6789 (for verification)
Credit Card: 4532-1234-5678-9010

Please help me reset my password and verify my account.

Thanks,
John Smith
